name: heist
description: Get a group together and attempt to heist a taypoint bank

options.name: play
options.description: Start or join a heist in the current channel

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of taypoints to invest into heist equipment (the more you invest, the more you win)

options.name: profile
options.description: Show a heist player's track record

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the profile for, default you

options.name: leaderboard
options.description: Show the current server's heist leaderboard
